meanings.definition: To rid the body of toxic substances.
meanings.sent1: After the party, she detoxed by drinking lots of water.
meanings.sent2: He detoxed his system by eating more fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The cat detoxed after eating a bug by drinking milk.
meanings.sent4: The river detoxed itself by flowing through the clean mountains.
meanings.sent5: She detoxed her mind by taking a long walk in the fresh air.

meanings.definition: To undergo a process of removing toxins from the body.
meanings.sent1: He detoxed at the spa to feel healthier.
meanings.sent2: She detoxed her body by following a strict diet plan.
meanings.sent3: The robot detoxed its circuits to function better.
meanings.sent4: The city detoxed its water supply to make it safe to drink.
meanings.sent5: They detoxed their home by cleaning out all the old chemicals.
